fix the competitve cool downs and friendly fire, it's just so unfair to get kicked if my teammate accidentally walks in front of me while i'm shooting. honestly, it's really broken that i get a cool down for kicking someone because they're really toxic and negative, or because someone has to leave the match. i get it, people just really want to get a team and make sure that you commit to the game, but sometimes, there are just rare cases where things pop up and life is more important than the game. it's been a recurring issue that i accidentally kill a teammate or i have to kick or be kicked because another player or i have to leave the game. for the teamkilling issue, i'd like to see a system similar to that of Rainbow 6 Siege's, and i think that the cooldowns for kicking too many players should be much shorter and different from abandoning. but otherwise it's a good game, if those parts can get fixed i can definitely say i will spend more time playing.
Jogo muito bom para se divertir com os amigos e passar o tempo

It is a pretty fun game to play, but there's just a lot of cheaters, when you play rank and you've just started you're gonna play with people who are wayyyyyyyy better than you and it isn't fair. I hope they're gonna change things cuz it is starting to be anoying but in general it's really fun
